data.name: Genimas: Life reborn
data.detailed_description:
Concept



The story is based on Norse mythology, you are a warrior raised and trained by Freyja to fulfill your destiny which is to defeat Ragnarok, the evil entity that rules the universe.

After an unexpected visit from an old acquaintance of Freyja, Drassil has to undertake a journey through the 9 Nordic worlds, where you would have to evolve genetically to be able to adapt to different extreme environments.


Pollinate

In this action / adventure open-world game you as Drassil will find different trees of life during your adventure, you can pollinate each of these trees and produce four fruits that contain a new Drassil with new genetic powers. The new Drassil is an avatar that gives you unique abilities, powers and skins.

Die​

When Drassil dies, your soul will abandon your body and you can come back to any of the trees of life that you have discovered before.

Evolve​

You can be genetically evolved as a new Drassil within the fruits of tree of life, this avatar will be genetically adapted to the new challenges of the environments during the game.

• Genetic powers: depending on the area, Drassil will have different powers according to their genes, genes awaken powers to follow different paths, for example the gene for the drill arm gives the skill to travel through areas where there are rocks that can be destroyed with it, while the Vision gen allows you to see invisible enemies.
• Hostile environments: the environments are hostile, in some there may be high levels of radiation, others may be underwater, cold, dark, high temperatures, etc.
• Great genetic variety: there are a lot of genetic powers to face different hostile environments.
• Different endings: Depending on the acquired genes , the game will have different endings, some more difficult to unlock than others.
• Famous Norse mythological characters: You can see famous characters from Norse mythology such as Thor, Odin, Loki, Freyja, among others, with the artistic style of Genimas: Life reborn.

Features


Genetic Body
This Gene changes Drassil’s body to adapt him to different extreme environments such as extreme temperatures, high pressures, underwater, temporal effects, poisonous environments.



Genetic Eyes
This gene activates Drassil visual powers, it allows you to see invisible enemies, dangers, hidden paths, hidden places.



Genetics Left Arm
This gene transforms your left arm into a tool or a weapon, such as a drill arm, flamethrower arm, etc.

data.short_description: you are Drassil, a demigod raised and trained by Freyja far from civilization, your destiny is to defeat the evil entity known as Ragnarok and to achieve it, you will have to evolve genetically traveling through the 9 Nordic worlds.
